scripts.dist:prod_mac: cross-env BUILD_ENV=production yarn run build && electron-builder build --mac
scripts.dist:dev_mac: cross-env BUILD_ENV=development yarn run build &&  electron-builder build --mac
scripts.dist:prod_win: cross-env BUILD_ENV=production yarn run build && electron-builder build --win
scripts.dist:dev_win: cross-env BUILD_ENV=development yarn run build && electron-builder build --win
scripts.dist:prod_m1: cross-env BUILD_ENV=production yarn run build && electron-builder build --mac --arm64
scripts.dist:dev_m1: cross-env BUILD_ENV=development yarn run build && electron-builder build --mac --arm64
